sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="submitComment()">
    <textarea v-model="this.newComment" placeholder="Write a comment..." :rows="3"></textarea>
    <button>Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
import { addComment } from "../../../src/Methods/CommentMethod.js"
export default {
  name: "CommentForm",

  props: {
    comments: Array
  },
  data() {
    return {
      newComment: ""
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submitComment() {
      console.log(this.comments)
      this.comments = addComment(this.book, this.comments, this.newComment)
      this.newComment = ""
    }
  }
}
</script>
